description: This view aggregates multicam license utilization metrics by SAM number, including active licenses, installed devices in the last 365 days, and active multicams in the last 30 days.

schema.name: sam_number
schema.description: SAM number is a unique ID that ties customer accounts together in Netsuite, Salesforce, and Samsara cloud dashboard

schema.name: active_licenses
schema.description: Total count of active LIC-MC-AIM4 licenses for the account

schema.name: installed_devices
schema.description: Count of distinct multicam devices (HW-MC-AIM4) installed and active within the last 365 days

schema.name: active_multicams
schema.description: Count of active multicam (AIM4) devices with recording data in the last 30 days
